exmls.content:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="BackBtnSkin" width="169" height="146" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
	<e:Button id="btn_back" label="返回" bottom="0" left="0">
		<e:skinName>
		<e:Skin states="up,down,disabled" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing" xmlns:ns1="*">
			<e:Image width="100%" height="100%" source="back_png" source.down="back_png"/>
			<e:Label id="labelDisplay" size="42" fontFamily="KaiTi" text="返回" horizontalCenter="-16.5" verticalCenter="12"/>
		</e:Skin>
		</e:skinName>
	</e:Button>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="BeginSence" width="1920" height="1080" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing" xmlns:tween="egret.tween.*">
	<w:Declarations>
		<tween:TweenGroup id="tweenGroup">
			<tween:TweenItem target="{image}">
				<tween:Set/>
				<tween:To duration="2650" ease="quadIn">
					<tween:props>
						<e:Object alpha="{0.5}" y="{260}"/>
					</tween:props>
				</tween:To>
				<tween:To duration="3300" ease="quadIn">
					<tween:props>
						<e:Object alpha="{1}" y="{253}"/>
					</tween:props>
				</tween:To>
			</tween:TweenItem>
			<tween:TweenItem target="{image0}">
				<tween:Set/>
				<tween:To duration="3150" ease="quadIn">
					<tween:props>
						<e:Object alpha="{0.5}" x="{1140}"/>
					</tween:props>
				</tween:To>
				<tween:To duration="3350" ease="quadIn">
					<tween:props>
						<e:Object alpha="{0}" x="{1145}"/>
					</tween:props>
				</tween:To>
			</tween:TweenItem>
		</tween:TweenGroup>
	</w:Declarations>
	<w:Config id="164dac22c1d"/>
	<e:Image width="1920" height="1080" left="0" top="0" source="begin_png" locked="true"/>
	<e:Button id="btn_start" label="" anchorOffsetX="0" anchorOffsetY="0" verticalCenter="225.5" enabled="true" horizontalCenter="0.5">
		<e:skinName>
			<e:Skin states="up,down,disabled">
			<e:Image width="100%" height="100%" source="btn_png" source.down="btn_png"/>
			<e:Label id="labelDisplay" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
			</e:Skin>
		</e:skinName>
	</e:Button>
	<e:Button id="btn_guize" label="" anchorOffsetX="0" anchorOffsetY="0" verticalCenter="328" enabled="true" horizontalCenter="0.5">
		<e:skinName>
			<e:Skin states="up,down,disabled">
			<e:Image width="100%" height="100%" source="guize_png" source.down="guize_png"/>
			<e:Label id="labelDisplay" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
			</e:Skin>
		</e:skinName>
	</e:Button>
	<e:Image id="image" source="yun1_png" y="253" x="771"/>
	<e:Image id="image0" x="1134" y="278.5" source="yun2_png"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?>
<e:Skin class="skins.ButtonSkin" states="up,down,disabled" minHeight="50" minWidth="100" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
    <e:Image width="100%" height="100%" scale9Grid="1,3,8,8" alpha.disabled="0.5"
             source="button_up_png"
             source.down="button_down_png" includeIn="up"/>
    <e:Label id="labelDisplay" top="8" bottom="8" left="8" right="8"
             size="20"
             textColor="0xFFFFFF" verticalAlign="middle" textAlign="center"/>
    <e:Image id="iconDisplay" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="CardViewSkin" width="300" height="100" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<e:Rect id="bg" width="300" height="100" strokeColor="0x444444" strokeWeight="0" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0" enabled="true" fillColor="0x683333"/>
	<e:Label id="lb_text" text="Label" anchorOffsetX="0" width="203" horizontalCenter="-38.5" verticalCenter="5" size="26" textColor="0xc5a56b" height="40" fontFamily="NSimSun" bold="true"/>
	<e:Image width="68" height="46" anchorOffsetX="0" anchorOffsetY="0" horizontalCenter="116" verticalCenter="0"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.CheckBoxSkin" states="up,down,disabled,upAndSelected,downAndSelected,disabledAndSelected" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Group width="100%" height="100%">
        <e:layout>
            <e:HorizontalLayout verticalAlign="middle"/>
        </e:layout>
        <e:Image fillMode="scale" alpha="1" alpha.disabled="0.5" alpha.down="0.7"
                 source="checkbox_unselect_png"
                 source.upAndSelected="checkbox_select_up_png"
                 source.downAndSelected="checkbox_select_down_png"
                 source.disabledAndSelected="checkbox_select_disabled_png"/>
        <e:Label id="labelDisplay" size="20" textColor="0x707070"
                 textAlign="center" verticalAlign="middle"
                 fontFamily="Tahoma"/>
    </e:Group>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="GameMapSkin" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing" xmlns:ns1="*" xmlns:tween="egret.tween.*" height="600" width="1000">
	<w:Declarations>
		<tween:TweenGroup id="tweenGroup">
			<tween:TweenItem target="{lb_question}">
				<tween:Set>
					<tween:props>
						<e:Object alpha="{0.5}"/>
					</tween:props>
				</tween:Set>
				<tween:To duration="1400" ease="sineIn">
					<tween:props>
						<e:Object alpha="{1}"/>
					</tween:props>
				</tween:To>
			</tween:TweenItem>
		</tween:TweenGroup>
	</w:Declarations>
	<w:Config id="167bef5db54"/>
	<e:Label text="倒计时：" x="837.94" y="20" textColor="0x70aeca" size="20" fontFamily="KaiTi" bold="true"/>
	<e:Label id="lb_time" text="180" y="20" anchorOffsetX="0" anchorOffsetY="0" size="20" fontFamily="KaiTi" bold="true" x="919.94" textColor="0x70aeca"/>
	<e:Group anchorOffsetX="0" anchorOffsetY="0" verticalCenter="-250" horizontalCenter="0.5">
		<e:Label id="lb_num" text="第1题" bold="true" fontFamily="KaiTi" horizontalCenter="0" textColor="0xfec969" x="78.61000000000001" scaleX="1" scaleY="1" bottom="10" size="40"/>
		<e:Image scaleX="1" scaleY="1" source="title_png" horizontalCenter="0" bottom="0"/>
	</e:Group>
	<e:Group id="gp_que" width="800" height="520" horizontalCenter="0" anchorOffsetX="0" anchorOffsetY="0" bottom="0">
		<e:Label id="lb_question" text="Label" x="104" y="54.82" fontFamily="KaiTi" anchorOffsetX="0" width="600" lineSpacing="10" wordWrap="true" multiline="true" textColor="0xffffff" size="36"/>
		<e:Button id="btn_true" label="是的" x="104" y="381">
			<e:skinName>
				<e:Skin states="up,down,disabled">
				<e:Image width="100%" height="100%" source="btn1_png" source.down="btn1_png"/>
				<e:Label id="labelDisplay" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0" textColor="0x2e6d8a" size="28" fontFamily="KaiTi"/>
				</e:Skin>
			</e:skinName>
		</e:Button>
		<e:Button id="btn_false" label="不是" x="527.39" y="381">
			<e:skinName>
			<e:Skin states="up,down,disabled">
				<e:Image width="100%" height="100%" source="btn1_png" source.down="btn1_png"/>
				<e:Label id="labelDisplay" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0" textColor="0x2e6d8a" size="28" fontFamily="KaiTi"/>
			</e:Skin>
			</e:skinName>
		</e:Button>
	</e:Group>
	<e:Group id="gp_explain" width="732" height="393" horizontalCenter="0" bottom="50" visible="false">
		<e:Image source="result_png" left="0" right="0" top="-24" bottom="0" anchorOffsetY="0"/>
		<e:Button id="btn_next" label="下一题" y="282" horizontalCenter="0">
			<e:skinName>
				<e:Skin states="up,down,disabled">
				<e:Image width="100%" height="100%" source="btn1_png" source.down="btn1_png"/>
				<e:Label id="labelDisplay" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0" textColor="0x2e6d8a" fontFamily="KaiTi"/>
				</e:Skin>
			</e:skinName>
		</e:Button>
		<e:Label id="lb_title" text="Label" y="18" fontFamily="KaiTi" size="38" horizontalCenter="0"/>
		<e:Label id="lb_explain" text="Label" y="88" horizontalCenter="0" fontFamily="KaiTi" anchorOffsetX="0" width="450"/>
	</e:Group>
	<e:Group id="gp_result" width="789.39" height="460.61" y="58.12" anchorOffsetX="0" anchorOffsetY="-1.86" horizontalCenter="0" visible="false">
		<e:Label id="lb_text0" text="Label" y="46.5" horizontalCenter="0" fontFamily="KaiTi"/>
		<e:Label id="lb_text1" text="Label" y="125.33333333333334" horizontalCenter="0" fontFamily="KaiTi"/>
		<e:Label id="lb_text2" text="Label" y="203.66666666666669" horizontalCenter="0" fontFamily="KaiTi"/>
		<e:Label id="lb_text3" text="Label" y="281.52" horizontalCenter="0" fontFamily="KaiTi"/>
		<e:Button id="btn_restart" label="再次挑战" y="369" horizontalCenter="0">
			<e:skinName>
				<e:Skin states="up,down,disabled">
				<e:Image width="100%" height="100%" source="btn1_png" source.down="btn1_png"/>
				<e:Label id="labelDisplay" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0" fontFamily="KaiTi" textColor="0x2e6d8a"/>
				</e:Skin>
			</e:skinName>
		</e:Button>
	</e:Group>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="GameSence" width="1920" height="1080" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:ns1="*" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<w:Config id="16361bf0ed3"/>
	<e:Image width="1920" height="1080" left="0" top="0" source="game_png"/>
	<ns1:GameMap id="gm" height="574" verticalCenter="51" left="475" right="475" width="1000" anchorOffsetX="0" anchorOffsetY="0"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.HScrollBarSkin" minWidth="20" minHeight="8" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
<e:Image id="track" source="track_sb_png" scale9Grid="1,1,4,4" width="100%"
             height="6" verticalCenter="0"/>
    <e:Image id="thumb" source="roundthumb_png" scale9Grid="3,3,2,2" height="8" width="30" verticalCenter="0"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.HSliderSkin" minWidth="20" minHeight="8" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Image id="track" source="track_sb_png" scale9Grid="1,1,4,4" width="100%"
             height="6" verticalCenter="0"/>
    <e:Image id="thumb" source="thumb_png" verticalCenter="0"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="HomeSence" width="1920" height="1080" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing" xmlns:ns1="*">
	<w:Config id="164dac22c1d"/>
	<e:Image width="1920" height="1080" left="0" top="0" source="bg1_png"/>
	<e:Label text="    每轮二十道题，随机从题库抽题，每次答题结束后会统计本轮分析您的答题准确率，题目的答案分布在博物馆展厅各处。" anchorOffsetX="0" width="651.4" anchorOffsetY="0" height="169.89" fontFamily="KaiTi" size="30" bold="true" verticalAlign="top" textAlign="left" horizontalCenter="-0.5" textColor="0xffffff" y="431.06" multiline="true" wordWrap="true" lineSpacing="10"/>
	<e:Button id="btn_back" label="我已了解" x="893" y="688">
		<e:skinName>
			<e:Skin states="up,down,disabled">
			<e:Image width="100%" height="100%" source="btn1_png" source.down="btn1_png"/>
			<e:Label id="labelDisplay" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0" textColor="0x2e6d8a" fontFamily="KaiTi" size="30" bold="true"/>
			</e:Skin>
		</e:skinName>
	</e:Button>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?>
<e:Skin class="skins.ItemRendererSkin" states="up,down,disabled" minHeight="50" minWidth="100" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Image width="100%" height="100%" scale9Grid="1,3,8,8" alpha.disabled="0.5"
             source="button_up_png"
             source.down="button_down_png"/>
    <e:Label id="labelDisplay" top="8" bottom="8" left="8" right="8"
             size="20" fontFamily="Tahoma"
             textColor="0xFFFFFF" text="{data}" verticalAlign="middle" textAlign="center"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?>
<e:Skin class="skins.MenuButtonSkin" states="up,down,disabled" minHeight="50" minWidth="100" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<e:Image width="100%" height="100%" scale9Grid="1,3,8,8" x="0" y="0" includeIn="down,disabled" source="t2_png"/>
    <e:Image width="100%" height="100%" scale9Grid="1,3,8,8" alpha.disabled="0.5"
            
             source.down="button_down_png" source="t1_png" includeIn="up"/>
    <e:Label id="labelDisplay" top="8" bottom="43" left="8" right="8"
             size="36"
             textColor="0xFFFFFF" verticalAlign="middle" textAlign="center" bold="true" anchorOffsetY="0" fontFamily="FangSong" text="字体" includeIn="up"/>
	<e:Label id="labelDisplay0" top="8" bottom="43" left="8" right="8" size="36" verticalAlign="middle" textAlign="center" bold="true" anchorOffsetY="0" fontFamily="FangSong" text="由来" includeIn="down,disabled" textColor="0x512311"/>
    <e:Image id="iconDisplay" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="MenuSkin" width="1600" height="121" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<e:Button id="btn_home" label="由来" verticalCenter="0" horizontalCenter="-523">
		<e:skinName>
			<e:Skin states="up,down,disabled">
			<e:Image width="100%" height="100%" source="t1_png" source.down="t2_png" source.disabled="t2_png"/>
			<e:Label id="labelDisplay" text="" includeIn="up" size="42" fontFamily="KaiTi" width="100" height="50" verticalCenter="-8.5" verticalAlign="top" bold="true" textAlign="center" horizontalCenter="0"/>
	<e:Label id="labelDisplay0" text="由来" includeIn="down,disabled" textColor="0x512311" size="42" fontFamily="KaiTi" width="100" height="50" verticalCenter="-8.5" verticalAlign="top" bold="true" textAlign="center" horizontalCenter="0"/>
			</e:Skin>
		</e:skinName>
	</e:Button>
	<e:Button id="btn_article" label="馆藏" x="721" y="1">
		<e:skinName>
		<e:Skin states="up,down,disabled">
			<e:Image width="100%" height="100%" source="t1_png" source.down="t2_png" source.disabled="t2_png"/>
			<e:Label id="labelDisplay" text="" includeIn="up" size="42" fontFamily="KaiTi" width="100" height="50" verticalCenter="-8.5" horizontalCenter="0" verticalAlign="top" bold="true" textAlign="center"/>
			<e:Label id="labelDisplay0" text="馆藏" includeIn="down,disabled" textColor="0x512311" size="42" fontFamily="KaiTi" width="100" height="50" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="-8.5" verticalAlign="top" bold="true" textAlign="center"/>
		</e:Skin>
		</e:skinName>
	</e:Button>
	<e:Button id="btn_game" label="游戏" x="1264" y="1">
		<e:skinName>
		<e:Skin states="up,down,disabled">
			<e:Image width="100%" height="100%" source="t1_png" source.down="t2_png" source.disabled="t2_png"/>
			<e:Label id="labelDisplay" text="" includeIn="up" size="42" fontFamily="KaiTi" width="100" height="50" verticalCenter="-8.5" horizontalCenter="0" verticalAlign="top" bold="true" textAlign="center"/>
			<e:Label id="labelDisplay0" text="游戏" includeIn="down,disabled" textColor="0x512311" size="42" fontFamily="KaiTi" width="100" height="50" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="-8.5" verticalAlign="top" bold="true" textAlign="center"/>
		</e:Skin>
		</e:skinName>
	</e:Button>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="NewViewSkin" width="300" height="300" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<e:Rect left="0" right="0" top="0" bottom="0" fillColor="0x6e321b"/>
	<e:Image id="img" anchorOffsetX="0" anchorOffsetY="0" horizontalCenter="0.5" verticalCenter="-22" source="01_png" fillMode="scale" width="300" height="198"/>
	<e:Label id="lbl_text" text="Label" verticalCenter="109" textColor="0xbd985c" fontFamily="Microsoft YaHei" size="20" horizontalCenter="0.5"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.PanelSkin" minHeight="230" minWidth="450" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Image left="0" right="0" bottom="0"  top="0" source="border_png" scale9Grid="2,2,12,12" />
    <e:Group id="moveArea" left="0" right="0" top="0" height="45">
        <e:Image left="0" right="0" bottom="0"  top="0" source="header_png"/>
        <e:Label id="titleDisplay" size="20" fontFamily="Tahoma" textColor="0xFFFFFF"
                 wordWrap="false" left="15" right="5" verticalCenter="0"/>
    </e:Group>
    <e:Button id="closeButton" label="close" bottom="5" horizontalCenter="0"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.ProgressBarSkin" minWidth="30" minHeight="18" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
	<e:Image source="track_pb_png" scale9Grid="1,1,4,4" width="100%"
			 height="100%" verticalCenter="0"/>
	<e:Image id="thumb" height="100%" width="100%" source="thumb_pb_png"/>
	<e:Label id="labelDisplay" textAlign="center" verticalAlign="middle"
			 size="15" fontFamily="Tahoma" textColor="0x707070"
			 horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.RadioButtonSkin" states="up,down,disabled,upAndSelected,downAndSelected,disabledAndSelected" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Group width="100%" height="100%">
        <e:layout>
            <e:HorizontalLayout verticalAlign="middle"/>
        </e:layout>
        <e:Image fillMode="scale" alpha="1" alpha.disabled="0.5" alpha.down="0.7"
                 source="radiobutton_unselect_png"
                 source.upAndSelected="radiobutton_select_up_png"
                 source.downAndSelected="radiobutton_select_down_png"
                 source.disabledAndSelected="radiobutton_select_disabled_png"/>
        <e:Label id="labelDisplay" size="20" textColor="0x707070"
                 textAlign="center" verticalAlign="middle"
                 fontFamily="Tahoma"/>
    </e:Group>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.ScrollerSkin" minWidth="20" minHeight="20" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:HScrollBar id="horizontalScrollBar" width="100%" bottom="0"/>
    <e:VScrollBar id="verticalScrollBar" height="100%" right="0"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="skins.TextInputSkin" minHeight="40" minWidth="300" states="normal,disabled,normalWithPrompt,disabledWithPrompt" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
	<e:Image width="100%" height="100%" scale9Grid="1,3,8,8" source="button_up_png"/>
	<e:Rect height="100%" width="100%" fillColor="0xffffff"/>
 	<e:EditableText id="textDisplay" verticalCenter="0" left="10" right="10"
	                textColor="0x000000" textColor.disabled="0xff0000" width="100%" height="24" size="20" />
	<e:Label id="promptDisplay" verticalCenter="0" left="10" right="10"
	                textColor="0xa9a9a9" width="100%" height="24" size="20" touchEnabled="false" includeIn="normalWithPrompt,disabledWithPrompt"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.ToggleSwitchSkin" states="up,down,disabled,upAndSelected,downAndSelected,disabledAndSelected" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Image source="on_png"
             source.up="off_png"
             source.down="off_png"
             source.disabled="off_png"/>
    <e:Image source="handle_png"
             horizontalCenter="-18"
             horizontalCenter.upAndSelected="18"
             horizontalCenter.downAndSelected="18"
             horizontalCenter.disabledAndSelected="18"
             verticalCenter="0"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.VScrollBarSkin" minWidth="8" minHeight="20" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Image id="thumb" source="roundthumb_png" scale9Grid="3,3,2,2" height="30" width="8" horizontalCenter="0"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.VSliderSkin" minWidth="25" minHeight="30" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Image id="track" source="track_png" scale9Grid="1,1,4,4" width="7" height="100%" horizontalCenter="0"/>
    <e:Image id="thumb" source="thumb_png" horizontalCenter="0" />
</e:Skin>
